#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#include<string.h>
int main ()
{
        unsigned int T, len, i;
        int count;
        scanf("%d\n",&T);
        char string[100001];
        while(T--)
        {
                gets(string);
                len = strlen (string);
                count = 0;
                for(i=0;i<len;i++)
                {
                        if(string[i]=='T')
                        count++;
                        else
                        count--;
                        if(count<0)
                        break;
                }
 
                if(count==0)
                puts("YES");
                else
                puts("NO");
        }
        return 0;
}
